mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, `body` =#{body}
mapper.select: SELECT article.*,`member`.nickname AS extra_writerName FROM article LEFT JOIN `member` ON article.memberId = `member`.Id WHERE article.id = #{id}
